Class ConfigHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.Reader
      • java.io.BufferedReader

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.lang.Readable

    public class ConfigHandler
extends java.io.BufferedReader
    Reads config files and retrieves information from them.

        Gets a substring beginning from the first occurrence of begin or null if no occurrence is found.

      • getBetween

        private java.lang.String getBetween(java.lang.String line,
                          char begin,
                          char end)
        Gets a substring starting from the first occurrence of begin and ending at first occurrence of end.

        Gets a substring starting from the first occurrence of begin and ending at first occurrence of end after begin. The characters begin and end are not included in substring. Returns null if both begin and end are not found.

        Parameters:
        line - Line to be searched
        begin - Char substring will begin from
        end - Char substring will end at
        Returns:
        A substring beginning at first occurrence of begin and ending at first occurrence of end after begin
